definition: trouble/disturbance/rumpus/flirty/coquettish/abbr. for 離騷|离骚[Li2 Sao1]/literary writings/smell of urine/foul smell/male (animal) (dialect)

sentences.english: During Xia, Shang and Zhou dynasties, Central Plains lay the core of Chinese civilization.
sentences.chinese: 夏商周三代文明，中原独领风骚，居于全国中枢地位。

sentences.english: FeiEr and tong Lin the excellences in the field of actress and the host.
sentences.chinese: 非儿和彤琳在女演员和主持人领域各领风骚。

sentences.english: You pretend to be pure also will not hide the fact that your coquettish.
sentences.chinese: 你假装清纯也掩盖不了你那风骚的事实。
你是一个爱卖弄风骚的人吗？

sentences.english: She coquetted with every young man she met.
sentences.chinese: 她向她碰到的每个年轻男人都卖弄风骚。

sentences.english: So far, it is still a rural American pop music, music coquettish independence.
sentences.chinese: 至今，它仍在美国流行乐坛上独领乡村音乐的风骚。

sentences.english: Ince toyed with the Celtic defence before clipping a delightful ball into the path of Suso.
sentences.chinese: 因斯风骚的技术一次次培植著凯尔特人的防线。

sentences.english: the belly dancer mover sensually among the tables.
sentences.chinese: 跳肚皮舞的姑娘风骚地在桌子之间移动着。

sentences.english: Luxury brands do well in the performance and design categories.
sentences.chinese: 豪华车在性能和设计领域独领风骚。

sentences.english: Just that, leading the trend of the figures, has changed a new generation.
sentences.chinese: 只是，领风骚的人物，已经换了一代新人。

sentences.english: For such an attachment as this, she might have sufficient charms;
sentences.chinese: 象这一类的苟合，丽迪雅的风骚妩媚可能也就足够了。

sentences.english: Opposite with the man tasteful , the woman is coquettish.
sentences.chinese: 相对与男人的风流，女人则是风骚了。

sentences.english: The days of three-button dominance are over.
sentences.chinese: 现在，“三扣“独领风骚的时代已经一去不复返了。

sentences.english: Of respecting woman coquettish , the man is used to a knock sb. down at one stroke.
sentences.chinese: 说到女人的风骚，男人习惯一棍子打死。

sentences.english: The animal waved her tail voluptuously, and her eyes grew gentle;
sentences.chinese: 这只动物风骚地摇了摇尾巴，眼睛也变得柔和了。

sentences.english: Mary teased sailors with her charms.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽卖弄风骚挑逗水手。
